titleInfo.title: Runaway Negroes detained in Police Jail, Second District, New Orleans.

mods.abstract: RUNAWAY NEGROES detained in Police Jail, Second District, New Orleans-- SIM, black man, about 27 years old, 5 feet 6 inches high ; says he belongs to Madame Carr, on Red River. ADAM, black man, about 29 years old, 5 feet 10 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. James Miller, of Mississippi. GEORGE SHEPHARD, black man, about 35 years old, 5 feet 4 inches high ; says he is free --but supposed to be a slave. JOHN CLIFTON, black man, about 33 years old, 6 feet 2 inches high ; says he belongs to William Stamps, near Natchez, Miss. ZEMI, dark griffe woman, about 55 years old, 4 feet 9 inches high ; says she belongs to Eugene Cuvullier, of New Orleans. A BLACK WOMAN, about 60 years old, 4 feet 9 inches high, calls herself MADAME BAPTISTE; says she is free -- but supposed to be a slave. W.H. WATERS. jan27 1aw3w Keeper of the Police Jail, Second District
